bibl.title: Studies of Ancient Egyptian Footwear. Technological Aspects. Part. XII. Fibre Shoes.
bibl.note: The paper represents part XII of the series on the technological aspects of footwear, as part of the Ancient Egyptian Footwear Project (AEFP). - Includes 1 shoe of Roman date.

bibl.title: British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.seg: VELDMEIJER André J., Studies of Ancient Egyptian Footwear. Technological Aspects. Part. XII. Fibre Shoes.

British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 14 (2009) pp. 97-129, 7 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/online_journals/bmsaes/issue_14/veldmeijer_b.aspx >.]
The paper represents part XII of the series on the technological aspects of footwear, as part of the Ancient Egyptian Footwear Project (AEFP). - Includes 1 shoe of Roman date.
